review: Works great. Easy to use. Love it.
author: Wyatt H.

review: I finally get to see what I want to watch!!!!
author: Katie

review: We are enjoying this little device! Sure beats having to hook up the computer to the tv!
author: pattib

review: Very pleased with it.  Set up easy and works very well.
author: Douglas

review: I don't think I have begun to explore all it can do....still figuring it all out.
author: K Marie Tyler

review: Arrived quickly, excellent packaging. Easy set up. Works fine. Haven't had time to fully check it out. Very satisfied so far.
author: A. Addison "Cyclenut"

review: This thing is so cool! Installed and operating in under10 minutes. Now all of Prime is on my tv. This thing rocks.
author: Decimus Varro

review: great! I love it. It basically made my regular tv in to a "smart" one! works great & its fast has never frozen, and loads Everything smoothly
author: Delia Espinal

review: Device works great. Just wish it had more cable TV apps.
author: Spenser McGerald

review: I like it for the most part but does not pick up all my music on Amazon music.  Spent over an hour with tech and she could do nothing to help so no solution.  Other than that it is great.  Oh up date your movies.
author: G. W. lewis
